name: Job Detail Page Scraper
description: Extract complete job information from a single job posting page (FINN.no or NAV.no)
navigation_goal: Navigate to the job posting page and wait for all content to load, including contact information and full job description.
data_extraction_goal:
Extract ALL available information from the job posting:

ESSENTIAL INFORMATION:
1. Job title (exact full title)
2. Company name
3. Location (full address if available, otherwise city/region)
4. Full job description (complete text, not truncated)
5. Requirements (all listed qualifications and skills)
6. Responsibilities (what the job involves)

CONTACT INFORMATION:
7. Contact person name
8. Contact email
9. Contact phone number
10. Company website

JOB DETAILS:
11. Application deadline
12. Employment type (permanent, temporary, contract)
13. Work extent (full-time, part-time, percentage)
14. Salary range (if mentioned)
15. Start date
16. Industry/sector
17. Required experience level
18. Required education

BENEFITS & PERKS:
19. Benefits mentioned (insurance, pension, etc)
20. Work arrangements (remote, hybrid, office)

Return as JSON object with all fields. Use null for fields not found on the page.

error_code_mapping.EXTRACTION_INCOMPLETE: Some job details could not be extracted
